# 6. Frontier Safe Zone
[color=red]Colonial Outpost and the 200 meter radius around it is considered a safe zone. Absolutely no antag activity or griefing is permitted within that zone.[/color]
The following rules apply to the safe zone: - Do not destroy or damage the structure of Colonial Outpost. - Do not destroy, modify, remove, or restrict the use of any machine or device designed for public use on Colonial Outpost. -- This includes hacking or sabotaging airlocks. - The Station Rep's approval is required for any modifications of the station. -- Modifications which may detract from the business of other contractors (e.g. adding kitchens, research servers and lathes) in the safezone is not allowed. - Unnecessary violence, such as shooting guns or swinging weapons, is discouraged in the safe zone. -- If a hostile creature (e.g. a space bear) or pest animal (e.g mouse, cockroach) is seen on Colonial Outpost, it can be killed with impunity. - Do not transport any kind of creature or object with the intent to cause harm/death. - Dangerous research on artifacts and anomalies must not be done while inside the safe zone. - Pirates may not (willingly) be at the Colonial Outpost. This does not count if a pirate is unwillingly present (such as being arrested). - Players must make best efforts to keep the docks at Colonial Outpost free and clear for the use of others. -- The Trade Outpost / Trade Mall can be used if you wish to remain docked to a station to conduct business or provide services (such as selling food). -- Exceptions can be made for shuttles purchased by station staff from the Staff Shipyard at the discretion of the SR or STC. However, docks must be kept clear at times of high demand.
